title: Matches Fashion Designer Workout Gear Sale 2019
text:
12 items in this article 12 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

Matches Fashion is having an excellent sale right now, with some picks up to 70 percent off. But other less aggressively discounted items now qualify for an extra 20 percent off with the code EXTRA20, including a lot of designer workout gear. So not everything listed here is part of the sale-on-sale, but everything is deeply discounted, as in under $100. That includes windbreakers from Adidas by Stella McCartney, trainer-approved workout leggings from the Upside, and jersey track pants from LNDR — all for up to 70 percent off the list price.
